channel.title: The Original, boring runescape
channel.description: Is there anyway to get a runescape server that is no different then how java made it? I dont want the new runescape, just a server that is original, with regular leveling and attack speeds, quests, places, and music, if possible. I mean the real original!

item.title: The Original, boring runescape
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

lol, its ok fualty… most people only try to make them selves feel big… but really most of the people here dont know a word that they are reading on these forums… but thats why they have noob friendly tutorials… that way everyone can learn how to code… and if i was you i would read some of the best… like if you want to start if a base that is similar to runescape then start with dodian… and change the starting place and all that… its got most of the stuff set up in the right places and all… so its highly similar to runescape, you just need to fix up some stuff which wont be to hard… and if you wish to add alot… then ask rog3r… he is a good coder with dodian.

item.title: The Original, boring runescape
item.dc:creator: @fualtycannon fualtycannon
item.description:
@fualtycannon wrote:

O.k. so this is really gonna be an expierement. Better start now lol. And no moer shop tools for me. Thanks guys! I’m glad I got active responses. So thanks for staying up to date with me. I can’t wait to start this. Ill look forward to making tutorials as soon as I can to repay for the help. But it’ll be a while, I dont exspect to learn this over night lol. And also, are all corrdinates for servers the same? like is varrock located in the same place as varrock in a different server? (x,y)=(x2,y2)

Read full topic

item.title: The Original, boring runescape
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“fualtycannon, post:35, topic:228941”]O.k. Thanks for the replies everyone. So the best thing for me to do is to start learning java. Now recently I fell upon a little program called a shop maker. I place the code it gives me with all the global items, but it doesnt make anything. Even after I compile it. Is there something else I haver to do to make it visible or something?[/quote]experiment with your codes. don’t use a tool to help you, you won’t learn. edit > compile > run. you’ll get used to it.

Read full topic
